error.message: Class Drupal\views_base_url\Tests\ViewsBaseUrlFieldTest extends deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.

Call to method setUp() of deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.
Call to deprecated function drupal_realpath(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystem::realpath().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to views_base_url.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.

The drupal/core requirement is not Drupal 9 compatible. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement compatible with Drupal 9.
